name: Honey Homer RPS
description:
This game is a rock-paper-scissors game. A game is played with the nine hands. The player who wins five times first wins. In case of a tie, the game goes into extra.



If in the top ranks of the league, advance to a tournament. A tournament is over after one loss. You will get coins after league or tournament matches.



You can use coins to collect cards. There are 120 types of cards in total.
